description.value:
Though gruesome, the austere countenance of this severed head is untouched by time. When its milky eyes open, a raspy voice details a foe's doom.

Wondrous Item: Rare

Property:

You gain a +3 item bonus to skill checks made as part of a divination ritual.

Level 26: +5 item bonus.

Power ✦ Daily (Standard Action)

Attack: Ranged 5 (one creature that can see); the item's level +3 vs. Will

Hit: The target is stunned (save ends).

Aftereffect: The target is dazed (save ends).

Power ✦ Daily (Standard Action)

Effect: Until your next extended rest, the Oracle's head can answer up to three questions as if you had used the Consult Oracle ritual. You can spread these questions out over the course of the day.

Level 26: The Oracle's head can answer up to five questions.
